properties.areaDesc: Rappahannock River from Urbanna to Windmill Point; James River from Jamestown to the James River Bridge; York River
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 3:48AM EST until January 8 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Rappahannock River from Urbanna to Windmill Point,
York River and James River from Jamestown to the James River
Bridge.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY
